original_text: For every house is builded by some man; but he that built all things is God.
korean_text: 집마다 지은 이가 있으니 만물을 지으신 이는 하나님이시라

sentences.original_text: For every house is builded by some man
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 집은 어떤 사람에 의해 지어집니다

sentences.original_text: but he that built all things is God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모든 것을 지으신 분은 하나님이십니다
